uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.46
uvi.description:
can: j1939: fix Use-after-Free, hold skb ref while in use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit 509ab6bfdd0c76daebbad0f0af07da712116de22, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 9d71dd0c70099914fcd063135da3c580865e924c. For more details please see the references link.
